description: Test suite for ScheduleProvider in Flutter app, testing CRUD operations, data filtering, and error handling using Mockito mocks.

classes.name: ScheduleProvider
classes.description: Provider class managing schedules, including loading, adding, updating, deleting, and filtering schedule data.

classes.name: MockDatabaseService
classes.description: Mock class for DatabaseService used in testing.

classes.name: Schedule
classes.description: Model class representing a schedule entity.

methods.name: loadSchedules
methods.description: Loads schedules from the database service into the provider.

methods.name: addSchedule
methods.description: Adds a new schedule to the database and updates local state.

methods.name: updateSchedule
methods.description: Updates an existing schedule in the database.

methods.name: deleteSchedule
methods.description: Deletes a schedule by ID from the database.

methods.name: getSchedulesForDay
methods.description: Retrieves schedules for a specific day, sorted by start time.

methods.name: getSchedulesForClass
methods.description: Retrieves schedules for a specific class.

methods.name: uniqueClasses
methods.description: Returns a list of unique class names from schedules.
